title: Aromatherapy Oil
author: Sarah F
description: Ease stress and tension with a roll-on essential oil, made with nourishing apricot and coconut carrier oils. This aromatherapeutic blend features peppermint, spearmint, and eucalyptus to instantly refresh and soothe the senses.
